ing: 1 (0.53 ounce) package McCormickÂ® French Onion Dip Seasoning Mix
des: "In the late '40s, Utah changed the French fry dipping scene forever Â– and for the better Â– with Utah Fry Sauce! With just four simple ingredients, including the savory bite of McCormickÂ® French Onion Dip Mix, our version of the popular condiment is perfect when you're in a time crunch. Serve it with curly fries and enjoy the game!"
ins:
Mix all ingredients in small bowl until well blended. Cover.
Refrigerate 1 hour or until ready to serve. Stir before serving. Serve with French fries.
